alert.note: Alert for Cross; St. Francis (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 12 at 12:35AM CDT until April 12 at 1:15AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern St. Francis County in eastern Arkansas... Cross County in eastern Arkansas... * Until 115 AM CDT. * At 1235 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles south of Patterson, or 11 miles southeast of Augusta, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Forrest City, Wynne, Parkin, Village Creek State Park, Cherry Valley, Caldwell, Colt, Fair Oaks, Vanndale, Hydrick, Birdeye, Cottonwood Corner, Fitzgerald Crossing, Colton, McDonald, Brushy Lake, Round Pond, McElroy, Blackfish and Mersman. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
